section_about.about_me: As a Systems Engineer with a deep passion for the digital experiences, I thrive on leveraging new technologies to build and scale innovative products. I am a tech generalist who focuses on bridging the gap among several areas of knowledge. My expertise lies at the intersection of various disciplines, and I enjoy participating in all project stages, from conception and beyond
section_about.summary: Applying systems engineering discipline and design thinking empathy to deliver  user-centric solutions that drive impact
